pullRequest.title: Add documentation on how to configure TLS for RCA
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available: 63
Description of changes: Add documentation on how to configure TLS for RCA to INSTALL.md
Tests: N/A
Code coverage percentage for this patch: N/A
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message: Add documentation on how to configure TLS for RCA

nodes.bodyText: Should we say properties instead of entries ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,18 @@ This document walks you through the process of building and deploying the RCA fr
     a. Launch IntelliJ IDEA
     
     b. Choose Import Project and select the `build.gradle` file in the root of this package
+    
+ 5. (Optional) TLS Setup
+ 
+    a. Open pa_config/performance-analyzer.properties
+    
+    b. Modify the certificate-file-path, private-key-file-path, and https-enabled entries

nodes.bodyText: Should we put myUser inside <> to make it obvious they should replace these with the suitable value ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,18 @@ This document walks you through the process of building and deploying the RCA fr
     a. Launch IntelliJ IDEA
     
     b. Choose Import Project and select the `build.gradle` file in the root of this package
+    
+ 5. (Optional) TLS Setup
+ 
+    a. Open pa_config/performance-analyzer.properties
+    
+    b. Modify the certificate-file-path, private-key-file-path, and https-enabled entries
+    
+    c. Example performance-analyzer.properties:
+        
+        certificate-file-path = /etc/ssl/certs/example.com.crt
+        private-key-file-path = /home/myUser/.ssh/id_rsa
